card.name: Ponman Statue
card.description: {{KW:MAGIC}}: If played on the left, give an ally {{TRIBE:PIECE|1}} +2 {{ATK}} and {{KW:TRANSPARENCY}}. If played on the right, give an ally {{TRIBE:PIECE|1}} +2 {{HP}} and {{KW:CANDY}}. {{KW:SYNERGY}}: Give it both.

description.now: {{KW:MAGIC}}: If played on the left, give an ally {{TRIBE:PIECE|1}} +2 {{ATK}} and {{KW:TRANSPARENCY}}. If played on the right, give an ally {{TRIBE:PIECE|1}} +2 {{HP}} and {{KW:CANDY}}. {{KW:SYNERGY}}: Give it both.
description.prev: {{KW:MAGIC}}: If played on the left, give an ally {{TRIBE:CHESS_FIGURE|1}} +2 {{ATK}} and {{KW:TRANSPARENCY}}. If played on the right, give +2 {{HP}} and {{KW:CANDY}} instead.
